topic.title: About the Aozora Bunko Samples
topic.shortdesc: The Aozora Bunko samples are DITA-marked-up versions of out-of-copyright or non-copyrighted Japanese works published by the Aozora Bunko project.

body.p: The Aozora Bunko (http://www.aozora.gr.jp/) project is similar to Project Gutenberg. It is a collection of out-of-copyright and non-copyrighted works in Japanese. I have taken some of these works and marked them up in DITA using the DITA for Publishers vocabularies, primarily to provide samples in Japanese that demonstrate and exercise the localization features of DITA and DITA for Publishers.
